item.description:
Scituate Heritage Days: Enjoy a day of live music and entertainment as well as artisan crafts There will be rock and blues musicians such as Fat City Band, Orpheus and the Fools as well as other acts to be announced later. This takes place on Front Street, one block up from the waterfront. We will most likely organize carpools.

Schedule of events for Sunday August 5th
There are several eateries on Front Street

11:15 AM Fat City Band
1:00 PM Oyster shucking contest $500. cash prize
1:00 - 4:00 PM Noel Irish Band
1:15 PM Danny Klien and the J Geils Review(Bass player from the original J.Geils Band)
2:20 PM Buddy Miles
4:00 PM Dickey Betts Southern rock at it's best ( Lead guitarist for the Allman Brothers)
6:00 PM last shuttle leaves

Buses continually run between Scituate HS, Gates Middle School,& Jenkins Elementry School to Front Street where the fair is taking place
item.name: Scituate Heritage Days
